title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hamas Terror Infrastructure in Gaza: Precision Attack Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A short while ago, the IDF attacked using a fighter jet, guided by intelligence information from Military Intelligence, the Shabak, and the Southern Command, targeting several terrorists who were in a Hamas-used terror infrastructure in the Zeitoun area.
This infrastructure served as a UNRWA compound and as the headquarters of the Gaza City Brigade within the Hamas terrorist organization.

Before the attack, numerous measures were taken to minimize the likelihood of harming civilians, including the use of contracts and precision munitions, as well as additional intelligence information.

The Hamas terrorist organization systematically violates international law, cruelly exploiting civilian institutions and the population as human shields for terrorist actions.
